propose: dependent reading bidirectional LSTM ( DR - BiLSTM ) model

propose.from sentence: We propose a dependent reading bidirectional LSTM ( DR - BiLSTM ) model to address these limitations .

first encodes.from sentence: Given a premise u and a hypothesis v , our model first encodes them considering dependency on each other .

soft attention mechanism.from sentence: Next , the model employs a soft attention mechanism to extract relevant information from these encodings .

augmented sentence representations.from sentence: The augmented sentence representations are then passed to the inference stage , which uses a similar dependent reading strategy in both directions , i.e. u ? v and v ? u .

made through.from sentence: Finally , a decision is made through a multi - layer perceptron ( MLP ) based on the aggregated information .
